name: Hero of the Kingdom

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Hero of the Kingdom/Hero of the Kingdom.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Groupees installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Hero of the Kingdom/Hero of the Kingdom.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /sp- /verysilent /norestart /suppressmsgboxes /nogui
    executable: $file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
